sys_properties.description: LinkedIn API endpoint for sharing posts via SNAS export flow. Production endpoint for LinkedIn v2 shares API.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_api_endpoint

sys_properties.description: LinkedIn OAuth access token for SNAS export flow API authentication. ENCRYPTED - Stores bearer token securely. For mock testing, leave blank to use mock endpoint.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_oauth_token

sys_properties.description: Enable mock mode for LinkedIn API during development and testing. When true, uses mock responses instead of actual LinkedIn API calls.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_mock_mode

sys_properties.description: Mock LinkedIn API endpoint for testing SNAS export flow without actual LinkedIn integration. Used when mock_mode is enabled.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_mock_endpoint

sys_properties.description: REST call timeout in milliseconds for LinkedIn API requests. Default 5000ms (5s) to meet SLA requirements of <2s total flow execution.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_timeout_ms

sys_properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed LinkedIn API calls. Implements exponential backoff strategy.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_max_retries

sys_properties.description: Retry delay in milliseconds for LinkedIn API failures. Base delay for exponential backoff calculation.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_retry_delay_ms

sys_properties.description: Enable performance monitoring and SLA tracking for SNAS LinkedIn export operations. Creates detailed execution logs.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.linkedin_performance_monitoring

sys_properties.description: SNAS branding primary color (Navy) for UI components and notifications. Hex color code for military heritage theming.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.brand_color_navy

sys_properties.description: SNAS branding accent color (Gold) for highlights and interactive elements. Hex color code for military heritage theming.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_snas_port.brand_color_gold
